artifacts.summary: Research report analyzing conceptual-engineering.md source content, Introduction.tex structure/style, and recommending section placement after opening paragraphs with 3-4 paragraph implementation focusing on logic as normative engineering vs descriptive linguistics

key_findings: Source document has 495 lines covering logic as normative concept engineering
Target Introduction has 285 lines with 4 subsections
Recommended placement: new subsection after line 28, before Extension Dependencies
Key content: normative vs descriptive contrast, material conditional example, ameliorative approach
Suggested length: 3-4 paragraphs (15-25 lines LaTeX source)
Must follow semantic linefeeds (one sentence per line)
